content.p: United Nations Development Programme (UNDP) Internship in Communications (Deadline for Application: 20 August 2013) Description: The Indonesian office of the United Nations Development Programme (UNDP) is advertising a 6-month internship, open to those who are enrolled in a postgraduate degree in a relevant field at the time of application. The intern will be based in the Office of the Resident Coordinator (RC Office) in Jakarta. Tasks include: telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
